p.s: I am Erwin's friend from Germany and I am writing to you, because I heard that the novel The Hate U Give was banned in the district of your school.
I am sure you have heard about the reasoning behind it as well.
I understand that it contains content not appropriate for younger students, but I don't see that as a reason enough to ban it.
Especially older students need to be educated on the discrimination in the country they live in and the not so pretty and harsh reality existing.
The novel empowers people to speak up and try to make a change in society, so that people do not have to take drugs and do criminal activities, which is exactly what they don't approve.
